Trade/Device Name(s): BD Tritest CD3/CD4/CD45 with BD Trucount Absolute Count Tubes
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Flow cytometer (with 488 nm laser, detection at 510-545 nm, 562-607 nm, >650 nm)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Tritest CD3/CD4/CD45 with Trucount Absolute Count Tubes for immunophenotyping T lymphocytes using flow cytometry.
Indications for Use Summary: For identifying and enumerating T lymphocytes and T-helper/inducer cells in lysed whole blood with or without isotype control, for characterization and monitoring of some autoimmune and immunodeficiency diseases, including in HIV-infected individuals.
